title: Fragtime
synopsis: Misuzu Moritani is an introvert who has always had difficulty interacting with her classmates, quickly becoming flustered whenever someone tries to talk to her. Sometimes, she will use her ability to stop time for three minutes to escape troublesome social situations.
staff: [['Itou, Miku', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Miyamoto, Yume', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['rionos', ['Music']], ['Sato', ['Original Creator']]]
